items.title: UPI Payment Integration
items.description: Integrate Unified Payments Interface (UPI) as a payment option during checkout to enable instant bank-to-bank transfers for users.
acceptance_criteria: Users can select UPI as a payment method at checkout
System supports major UPI apps (e.g., Google Pay, PhonePe, Paytm)
Payment confirmation is received within 10 seconds of transaction initiation
Transaction status is updated in the order management system in real-time
Failed transactions trigger appropriate error messages and retry options
non_functional: Transaction data encrypted in transit and at rest
Compliance with NPCI and RBI regulations

notes: Assumed requirement is to add UPI as an additional payment method alongside existing options; specific UPI providers to be confirmed.
